titleStmt.title: A pastoral dialogue between Alexis and Strephon written by the right honourable the late Earl of Rochester, at the bath, 1674.
titleStmt.author: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: bottom of sheet worn, with partial loss of imprint; bracketed material supplied from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
